channel.title: CVE Feed for Tickera -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tickera -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5860|2024-06-18T13:56:19.173Z -- tickera -- tickera%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20event%20ticketing
item.description: The Tickera – WordPress Event Ticketing plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the tc_dl_delete_tickets AJAX action in all versions up to, and including, 3.5.2.8. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to delete all tickets associated with events.

item.title: CVE-2024-35729|2024-06-10T07:44:29.227Z -- tickera -- tickera
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Tickera.This issue affects Tickera: from n/a through 3.5.2.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-5860|2024-06-18T03:13:36.455Z -- tickera -- tickera%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20event%20ticketing
item.description: The Tickera – WordPress Event Ticketing plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the tc_dl_delete_tickets AJAX action in all versions up to, and including, 3.5.2.8. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to delete all tickets associated with events.
